DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal proposal characterize immune cell profile subcutaneous abdominal adipose tissue lean , overweight , obese lipedema adult , evaluate potential association different adipose tissue immune cell type metabolic profile .
DOC.criteria: Women race ethnicity Age 18 65 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.5 kg/m² Weight stable ( +/ 3 % last 2 month enrollment ) Women already schedule mentioned procedure Diabetes Mellitus Recent ( < 5 year ) history cancer ( except situ ductal breast carcinoma ) Chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy within 4 month enrollment Immune system disease ( i.e. , autoimmune disorder , acquire immunodeficiency syndrome ) Pregnant breastfeed Take medication might affect immune function Severe organ dysfunction BMI < 18.5 kg/m² size breast > 600 gram , schedule bilateral breast reconstruction
